descriptionHtml:
[color=#f4cccc][color=#f4cccc][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#e06666][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60126-1-1416495162.jpg[/img]
I am not good at English. Sorry.[/size][/color][/font]
This MOD add the Summoner Torte of stand-alone follower.[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]Add FaceType-B. ( Option File )[/b]
[/size][size=3]To fit the body size(age) will be replaced with little cheek thin face.[/size][/font][/color]

[/font][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4cccc][size=3]She can be found at The Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.
Lv5-120

[b][color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Default　Summon Type[/size][/color][/b]
  She will be able to summon a unique MagicAnomaly and Draugr, but she herself does not have a special ability.
  Attack is only spell of enhanced flames.

  MagicAnomaly will be summoned 4 MagicAnomaly simultaneously.
  These cause Flame damage to enemies around the own.

  Number that can summon Draugr is 1.
  This Draugr will use the shout of  disarm and Unrelenting force, and use the Grand Healing(Restore Health 80 Points).
  In addition, Weapons will change depending on the level.

  MagicAnomaly and Draugr can be summoned simultaneously.

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Summon Type-Dwarven ( Option File )
[/b][/size][size=3]It is hard to become more obstructive than a default type, and is a more offensive summons type.
Heel can not be used.
[/size][/color]
  Torte of "Summon Type Dwarven" will summon a deformed been small Dwarven Centurion and Dwarven Sphere.

  Dwarven Sphere will be summoned 3 Dwarven Sphere simultaneously.
  Dwarven Sphere will attack by firing the ice bolt from long range.
  They do not do melee attacks.
  In addition, it reduces the movement speed of enemies who approaching.

  Number that can summon Dwarven Centurion is 1.
  Dwarven Centurion will combat using Melee attacks and Steam breath and Dragon rend breath.
  In addition, to stagger the surrounding enemies by Roar.

  Their attack power is enhanced in accordance with the level.
  Dwarven Centurion and Dwarven Sphere can be summoned simultaneously.

[color=#e06666][size=4][b][Change Log]
[/b][color=#f4cccc][size=3]  1.00 -> 1.01
    Fixed the color of the body, so as to match the color of the face.
    The location of Torte was changed into the Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.
 
  1.01 -> 1.10
    Add FaceType-B. ( Option File )
    Add Summon Type - Dwarven ( Option File )[/size][/color][/size][/color]

[b][color=#e06666][size=4][Requirements][/size][/color][/b]
  Skyrim Ver 1.9.32.0+
[/size][/color][/font][/color]
[color=#f4cccc][b][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e06666][size=4][Recommended Mods][/size][/color]
[/font][/size][/b][/color][color=#f4cccc][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]  Any of the follower overhaul mods.
  [/size][/font][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Female Facial Animation[/size][/font][/color][/url][color=#f4cccc][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]by nao4288 [/size][/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e06666] (This is very important!)
[/color]  [/font][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Face Light[/size][/font][/color][/url][color=#f4cccc][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] by tktk  [/size][/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e06666](Strongly recommended!)
[color=#f4cccc]  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304/?][color=#b6d7a8]SIZE DOES MATTER - NPCs do not rescale shrink resize -[/color][/url] by Mahlzeit88[/color]
[/color]
  I use The [/font][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]AIR ENB[/size][/font][/color][/url][color=#f4cccc][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] to take screenshots.

[/size][/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#b6d7a8][b][color=#e06666][size=4][Credits][/size][/color]
[/b][/color]  [/font][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Enhance Character Edit[/size][/font][/color][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] by tktk
  [/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Pretty Face[/size][/font][/color][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] by tktk
  [/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]SG Female Textures Renewal[/size][/font][/color][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] by Hello Santa
  [/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/size][/font][/color][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] by dimon99[/size][/font][size=3]
[font=Comic Sans MS]  [/font][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179/][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC[/size][/font][/color][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3] by MrTroubleMaker

  [/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?][color=#b6d7a8][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Mikan Eyes[/size][/font][/color][/url][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#b6d7a8] [/color]by nerune[/font][/size][size=3]

files.name: GCE Follower Torte
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the color of the body, so as to match the color of the face.
The location of Torte was changed into the "Windpeak Inn" in Dawnstar.
